events.name: empty
events.description: Emitted when next events are triggering like mouseup, mouseleave or clear button pressed, will return isEmpty status of signature pad

events.name: mouseup
events.description: Emitted when is mouseup event is trigger on signature pad and signature data is not empty and changed state, will return signature pad data value

events.name: mouseleave
events.description: Emitted when is mouseleave event is trigger on signature pad and signature data is not empty and changed state, will return signature pad data value
